title: # 539 - Dane Cook & ME
itunes:title: # 539 - Dane Cook & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian, Dane Cook. We talk about our long history together, on screen sex scenes, Jessica Alba, betting on yourself, excitement vs anxiety, his new special, and much more! 

 

Go to https://www.moment.co/danecook?ref=homepage for Danes brand new special “Above It All” 

 

Follow Dane

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/danecook 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DaneCook 

 

This episode is brought to you by Whoop Go to http://www.whoop.com and enter code BERT to save 10% off. To join the 2 Bears, 0 Drinks Team: https://app.whoop.com/mobile-redir?code=COMM-2BEARS (Mobile only)

 

This episode is also sponsored by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is brought to you by Manscaped. Get 20% Off and Free Shipping with the code BERT at http://www.Manscaped.com
